tool_description: Calculates wind pressures on building surfaces including main wind force resisting system and components/cladding loads.

velocity_pressure.description: Velocity pressure at building height in Pa

gust_factor.description: Gust effect factor from wind speed analysis

building_width.description: Building width perpendicular to wind in meters

building_length.description: Building length parallel to wind in meters

wall_pressure_coefficients.description: External pressure coefficients for walls [windward, leeward, side1, side2]

roof_pressure_coefficients.description: External pressure coefficients for roof zones

error_messages: Invalid pressure coefficients: Values must be within realistic range -2.0 to 1.0. Check code provisions for building geometry.
Missing velocity pressure: Obtain from Wind Speed Calculator tool first.
Inconsistent building dimensions: Verify height, width, and length are positive and realistic.
Array size mismatch: Pressure coefficient arrays must match expected number of building surfaces.
usage: Input velocity pressure and gust factor from wind analysis, building dimensions, and pressure coefficients (or use defaults). Tool calculates design pressures for structural analysis.

wall_pressures.description: Design pressures on each wall surface in Pa

roof_pressures.description: Design pressures on roof zones in Pa

total_wind_force.description: Total lateral wind force on building in kN
